name: Pitch Black (Game Jam - Incomplete)
description:
Thanks for checking out the page!
Unfortunately I didn't get to finish it due to time constraints, but it was fun!
I will make some post-jam updates to it, making it into the teaser I wanted it to be.

Pitch Black is a project I've had in mind for many years now and thought it'd be fun to make a game jam version / teaser of it. Hopefully some of the ideas shines through this rough piece of creation.
Submitted it mostly for preservation.

Made in under 20 days for the HQ_RESIDENTIAL_HOUSE_GAME_JAM
hosted by John Wolfe, Corpsepile and Breogán Hackett.

Coding, Music / Sound, Models and Textures created by:
Screamquency - (Me)

Low-Poly Furnitures created by:
Quaternius
